snippet: Nicholas Mevoli was competing at Vertical Blue, a championship event in the sport of free diving, where he was attempting to achieve his second American record.
abstract: Free-diver Nicholas Mevoli dies after descending more than 200 feet without fins at the Vertical Blue championship event in the Bahamas; 32-year-old Mevoli became first American to dive unassisted to 100 meters in May, and was attempting a second record at the time of his death.
lead_paragraph: Nicholas Mevoli was competing at Vertical Blue, a championship event in the sport of free diving, where he was attempting to achieve his second American record.

headline.main: A Deep-Water Diver From Brooklyn Dies After Trying for a Record
headline.print_headline: A Deep-Water Diver From Brooklyn Dies After Trying for a Record
